859720.name: Cubelz
859720.description:
Cubelz is or will be a game of achieving a specific goal in a certain amount of time without being hindered by opponents. It is possible through a choice to choose between several different blocks and weapons and place them in the world. After some time, the world starts to move around to challenge the players further out.

In a multiplayer mode will be working soon.
Saving the scores is not yet possible.
You can play in 3 Levels at this time.

This game is in early access and is therefore still subject to some mistakes.
In addition, we reserve the right to make changes to the controller.
859720.supported_languages:
德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
